sentences.sContent: Those nations that follow the rules will find greater security and opportunity.
sentences.sCn: 遵守规则的国家将得到更大的安全保障和机会。

sentences.sContent: Another is that they know they are on camera. "When you're visible, you're more likely to follow the rules," he adds.
sentences.sCn: 另一个是他们知道他们处于被监控状态。“当你被人看见时，你更有可能遵守规则。”他又补充道。

sentences.sContent: When you follow the rules, life works.
sentences.sCn: 当你遵守规则，生活就会顺心。
